project.name: Hono Integration Tests
project.description: Integration tests verifying Hono's APIs. Test cases are run against Docker images of Hono server + (Apache Qpid Dispatch Router and ActiveMQ Artemis broker).

runCmds.run: java -cp h2.jar org.h2.tools.Shell -url jdbc:h2:/data/devices -sql "create user if not exists ${hono.jdbc.h2.admin.username} password '${hono.jdbc.h2.admin.password}' admin;"
java -cp h2.jar org.h2.tools.Shell -url jdbc:h2:/data/devices -sql "create user if not exists ${hono.jdbc.h2.registry.username} password '${hono.jdbc.h2.registry.password}';"
java -cp h2.jar org.h2.tools.Shell -url jdbc:h2:/data/devices -sql "grant all on schema public to ${hono.jdbc.h2.registry.username};"
java -cp h2.jar org.h2.tools.Shell -url jdbc:h2:/data/tenants -sql "create user if not exists ${hono.jdbc.h2.admin.username} password '${hono.jdbc.h2.admin.password}' admin;"
java -cp h2.jar org.h2.tools.Shell -url jdbc:h2:/data/tenants -sql "create user if not exists ${hono.jdbc.h2.registry.username} password '${hono.jdbc.h2.registry.password}';"
java -cp h2.jar org.h2.tools.Shell -url jdbc:h2:/data/tenants -sql "grant all on schema public to ${hono.jdbc.h2.registry.username};"
